About Me

BIO

Highly motivated and diligent chemistry student with strong biological and chemical backgrounds seeking graduate employment. IT literate, exceptional communicative skills and the ability to exceed within a team in both a work and sporting environment.

University of Southampton

Master of Chemistry

• Developed strong analytical and problem-solving skills through examining and interpreting results.

• Enhanced communication skills and team working ability through group work and presentations.

• Consistent high levels of time management and organisation shown by planning and executing experiments within self-designated time frames.

• Gained ability to think independently and creatively to further develop both theses.

SureWolf Limited

Stock Purchaser

• Trusted to make high value purchases on behalf of the company.

• Use of data analysis to identify spending patterns within a specific market to aid in the identification of stock purchasing.

• Increased knowledge in the understanding of market forces and its importance to a business.

• Organisation skills were refined, balancing part time work with a busy university lifestyle.

• Improved ICT skills using Microsoft Excel to manage large quantities of raw data.

Boots, UK

Healthcare Advisor

• Provided clear and accurate health advice through focussed conversations with customers.

• Made recommendations based on medical knowledge regarding relevant products which will support their health and wellbeing

• Worked closely alongside a pharmacist delivering clear and effecting communication in a busy environment.

• Maintained high levels of customer service, including resolving complaints in a professional and tactful manner.
